function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of AI and ML for predicting epidemic outbreaks","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions leading to misallocation of resources","Mitigation":"Validation of predictions with real-time data and expert analysis","Technologies":"Real-time data collection and analysis, expert validation","People":"Public health agencies, healthcare providers, policymakers","Owner":"AI and ML development teams"},{"Description":"Data-based analysis for epidemic prediction","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data leading to incorrect predictions","Mitigation":"Validation of data with multiple sources, expert analysis, and statistical modeling","Technologies":"Data validation tools, statistical modeling software","People":"Healthcare researchers, data scientists","Owner":"Data analysis and research teams"},{"Description":"Patient information-based algorithm for mortality prediction","Impact":"Incorrect estimation of mortality rates","Mitigation":"Validation of algorithm with real patient outcomes, expert analysis, and clinical data","Technologies":"Clinical data analysis tools, outcome validation methods","People":"Clinical researchers, healthcare providers","Owner":"Algorithm development teams"}]}
